marklogic.body: To say that you don't deserve to live (IsraelÂ is a cancer, Israel should be wiped Off the map) is not the same thing as I am going to kill you. Iranians are not about to and probably will never attack Israel which doesn't have a border with Iran anyway. Nor will the Israelis attack Iran because the Ruskies have warned them and will shoot them down with the blessing of the US. Israel is in a tight Spot because it doesn't feel it has to make an effort to live with it's neighbors. They have to cahnge that and everything will be much easier.
